useCase.name: Deploy Cloudlet Service
useCase.description: Allow the user to deploy a cloudlet service.

preconditions.precondition: The necessary deployments tools are available.

successEndConditions.condition: The cloudlet service has been successfully deployed.

failureEndConditions.condition: An error occurred during the deployment process.

useCase.trigger: Request to deploy cloudlet service received.

mainSequence.step: Actor_NAME deploy cloudlet service using the CLI.
The CLI sends a deploy request to the cloudlet service.
Actor_NAME deploy cloudlet service using the Web interface.
The Web interface sends a deploy request to the cloudlet service.
